mapper.select: SELECT IS_SEAT AS SEATNUM, IS_TYPE AS SEATTYPE FROM "IS" WHERE IS_SCNUMBER = #{mvScreen} UNION SELECT RD_SEAT AS SEATNUM, RD_TYPE AS SEATTYPE FROM RD WHERE RD_RVCODE IN(SELECT RV_CODE FROM RV WHERE RV.RV_SISCNUMBER =#{mvScreen} AND TO_CHAR(RV.RV_SIDATETIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') = #{mvDateTime})
